title: Rotational Inertia - ranking ring loop and disk

content.question: Which of the following correctly compares the rotational inertias <math alttext="I sub D" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>D</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="I sub R" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>R</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>, and <math alttext="I sub L" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <msub> <mi>I</mi> <mtext>L</mtext> </msub> </mstyle> </math> of the disk, ring, and loop, respectively?

choices.label: <math alttext="open parenthesis, I sub R equals I sub L, close parenthesis, is greater than I sub D" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>R</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>L</mtext></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>D</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="I sub L is greater than open parenthesis, I sub R equals I sub D, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>L</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>R</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>D</mtext></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="I sub D is greater than I sub R, which is greater than I sub L" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>D</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>R</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>L</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="I sub L is greater than I sub R, which is greater than I sub D" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>L</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>R</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>D</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="I sub L is greater than I sub R, which is greater than I sub D" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>L</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>R</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>D</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
